SELECT P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE, P.APPROVED, P.CREATED_AT, P.SUM_PRICE, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, A.APPROVED_AT, S.NAME AS STORAGE_NAME, C.NAME AS CORRESPONDENT_NAME FROM TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE P JOIN TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_APPROVER A ON P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = A.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE JOIN TBL_STORAGE S ON P.STORAGE_CODE = S.STORAGE_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_CORRESPONDENT C ON P.CORRESPONDENT_CODE = C.CORRESPONDENT_CODE
P.ACTIVE = TRUE
AND P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = #{purchaseCode}
AND M.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%')
AND C.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{correspondentName}, '%')
AND S.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
AND P.CREATED_AT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
ORDER BY P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE) FROM TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE P JOIN TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_APPROVER A ON P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = A.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE JOIN TBL_STORAGE S ON P.STORAGE_CODE = S.STORAGE_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_CORRESPONDENT C ON P.CORRESPONDENT_CODE = C.CORRESPONDENT_CODE
P.ACTIVE = TRUE
AND P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = #{purchaseCode}
AND M.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberName}, '%')
AND C.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{correspondentName}, '%')
AND S.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
AND P.CREATED_AT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
ORDER BY P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE DESC

SELECT P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE, P.CREATED_AT, P.ACTIVE, P.APPROVED AS ALL_APPROVED, P.COMMENT AS MEMBER_COMMENT, P.CORRESPONDENT_CODE, C.NAME AS CORRESPONDENT_NAME, P.MEMBER_CODE, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, A.APPROVED AS APPROVER_APPROVED, A.COMMENT AS APPROVER_COMMENT, P.SUM_PRICE, S.STORAGE_CODE, S.NAME AS STORAGE_NAME, I.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE AS ITEM_PURCHASE_CODE, I.ITEM_CODE, T.NAME AS ITEM_NAME, T.ITEM_UNIQUE_CODE, T.PURCHASE_PRICE, I.QUANTITY FROM TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE P JOIN TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_APPROVER A ON P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = A.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE JOIN TBL_STORAGE S ON P.STORAGE_CODE = S.STORAGE_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_CORRESPONDENT C ON P.CORRESPONDENT_CODE = C.CORRESPONDENT_CODE JOIN TBL_LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_ITEM I ON P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = I.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE JOIN TBL_ITEM T ON I.ITEM_CODE = T.ITEM_CODE
P.LETTER_OF_PURCHASE_CODE = #{letterOfPurchaseCode}
